about_the_game:
Digital Behind the Scenes EBook (PDF)

Dive into the 32-page behind-the-scenes look into the making of Indie Dev Story, a game inspired by my own journey as an indie developer. Discover:
  • The original concept and inspirations
  • Development progress and challenges
  • Finding an art style
  • Ideas and features that didn’t make the cut
  • Enhancements for the Steam release
  • And much more!

Take a peak into what it takes to bring an indie game to life!


Notes:

- The Digital Behind the Scenes EBook (PDF) is available only in English.
- For info on where to find the EBook when you own the DLC, see the pinned post on the games community HUB page.
